Posts.Content: Hi - i read that you took some L-Glutamine for the side effects. Did it help? What dosage did you take or are you taking. I just started a weekly Taxotere Monday Sept. 25 which will be for 12 rounds and will have concurrent daily radiation for about 5 or 6 weeks. I am just want to prepare to minimize any possible side effects. Let me know. Thanks!
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Taxotere
